name: Penetrator: Core Dive
description:
Rotating circles? Jumping balls? Say no more! Sign me up now!

Penetrator is a unique game where you rotate circles in layers (onions have layers too!) and try to get a jumping ball to the center of the circle to win.


Features:
- hundreds of levels
- swipe to rotate
- move left and right to turn the circles
- avoid the red elements
- careful with the columns
- create combos and gain bullet speed
- get through hundreds of different levels

Rotate the circles and penetrate to the core!
